I... don't normally need such things, Mahiru. Even the smallest moment doesn't pass my sight.
That was new! Perhaps I should find a photographer in Labrynna.
Hee hee! Be sure to keep it safe!
Haha! I can't wait to see how it turned out!
Nine? Nine "S"? I don't mean to be disrespectful; I've never heard a name like that!
Oh! Are you a Great Fairy? What sort of power can you grant?
A... a Great Fairy? Here? W-well... what manner of power do you offer?
Ooh! Is that... a pictobox? I've heard of those, but I never got around to looking for one myself.
Oh! I think I've seen one of those before! You can use it to record a sight, right? A... pictobox?
There's something here. Something...
Monika... do you feel well? There's something wrong...
Oh, hello little fairy! What are you doing here? Are you lost?
Hello, little fairy! Are you going to play with us? Do... you need any help with your cards?
Palutena, is it? "Goddess", indeed... I trust you know of my namesake?
I've yet to meet a goddess in person, but... well, I trust the goddess Nayru would never find herself here.
"Healing"? Don't be absurd; why would I ever harm such a delicate flower?
Oh, can you heal wounds, Aella? Well... that will surely come in handy.
This simply won't do.
It looks like my streak will continue...
I... I truly did try, everyone. Still... I suppose I have no excuse.
Oh! So you go to school together? A... are you aware of the nature of this game...?
Are you taking a break from your studies? Well... I suppose if you're here, you must be of age...
My apologies... I suppose this isn't the best time for that. At any rate... thank you.
Some things are better left for... another time.
Strange. I... I don't think I lose this round...
No! I can't lose like this!
Even when I know what I'm doing...
I knew I should've... p-pardon. Never mind me.
I'd hoped to do better in this state of dress...
Are you... reshuffling the cards more than usual? Stop that!
Oh, such a shame.
O-oh... p-perhaps someone will have worse? S-somehow...
Ngh... not my bra...
It's cards like this that will lose me my bra...
There's little more I can do for my modesty...
I suppose... if I've come this far...
Oh. I see.
There is little safety here.
I suppose I can't complain.
I'm sorry, everyone; I'll get the hang of this soon!
Sometimes even an oracle must allow herself to lose.
This game would be little fun if I never lost a round, you know.
So this is the hand I saw. Don't worry, I won't cheat. You have my word.
I... I may have seen this hand before. I only didn't think it would come so soon.
Unacceptable. And to think, this is the best I could do.
Mmh... I'm sorry, everyone. I'm not feeling very well...
This is... strange. I'm not ill...
This wasn't supposed to happen...
These are... ngh... I'm sorry, I need a moment...
Perhaps I should lie down for a spell.
Is this your idea of a joke? I have a much better one!
This is just pitiful! I demand another attempt!
You won't get the last laugh!
Ngh! What is the meaning of this?
What? What? How... dare you?
You'd better not have a problem showing off your assets, Nayru.
I'm trying to think. I don't care about your bra; my pride is on the line!
Nayru's dignity may not outlast this round. More's the pity.
Oh, yes. I haven't forgotten you, "Nine". You aren't quite human... are you some sort of stunted goron?
"Upgrade"? Why, I do like the sound of that. I like you already, odd little man.
A servant of the goddess... taking up a holy blade... you remind me of a good friend of mine.
I can sense the good in you... I don't suppose you're a servant of the goddess?
Oh, Lady Palutena! And Sir Pit, as well! I'm ashamed that we haven't met properly.
Wait a moment... Sir Pit! And you must be Lady Palutena! Oh, what a delight!
Haah! O-oh! What... how strange... it's never done that before, I assure you!
Oh... oh, my... Perhaps... I ought to play that song more...
Ah! Ohh... how unsettling! What a loathesome song!
Oh, dear. J-just a moment! This statue disappears quickly, so allow me to speed that up...
Sometimes, when I play my songs with no humans around, I... wait... (So that's what her song does!)
You know, Ralph and I used to... wait a second... (Farore, you sneaky imp...)
Ah! Haha... I didn't think it would happen so fast!
Oh...! Haha... D-don't worry, I won't ruin anything! I... I hope...
A-and... I suspect nothing I say will be of any use to you now...
Oh, already? Again? Well... I suppose I'll dry us out immediately...
N-next week? I-I can try...
One week? Well... that shouldn't be a problem!
The reckless can't avoid their future, with or without me. Please... just a moment.
W-well... I suppose you'll see soon how Hylians differ from these "elves".
I-is that so? Why... what is she like?
Thank you! I... will surely protect them at all costs!
"Chihaya", you say? Hmm... I'm not familiar with her...
I'm... not familiar with her. But she sounds nice!
Something... big? I-I suppose what I'd intended to set aside next is quite valuable...
Really? I... I had no idea! What sort of power do you hold?
You... you are? Really? I... didn't sense anything of the sort. What power do you wield?
I'm not angered by defeat; I'm simply less experienced with it than some.
Do you think you'll rile me with petty digs? My, but your inexperience shines.
Your future? W-well... I suppose I can try. Please, give me just a moment...
Would you truly like to know? Sometimes the future can be... daunting.
E-erm... that might not be the best idea, Jura. But... I can try, if you'd like.
Of course; that won't be a problem at all! Just a moment...
I... I would, Jura, but... something's wrong. I can't see anything... just like when I look into ~player~'s future...
E-erm... I don't know; I'm having some trouble... concentrating...
I... I can try, but I seem to be having... difficulty.
What's...? I... I'm sorry, I'm having some trouble...
Navi, please, I... N-no, Meia, it's not... Erm... I'm not that Nayru.
N-no, erm... I'm just an oracle, Navi. You'll give everyone the wrong idea.
I'd be joyed to help Link in any way; any Link. For what he's done for me, I'll ever be in his debt.
For the chance to help Link again, I would lay down my very life. He's done the same, after all.
Your ordeal sounds arduous. But... it's not too late for me to lend my aid, you know. It's never too late for me.
Thank you, Ladybug. You always know what to say.
Gracious even in victory. I'm glad we've gotten the chance to play together, Ladybug.
Thank you, Marinette. You always know what to say.
Gracious even in victory. I'm glad we've gotten the chance to play together, Marinette.
Thank you, Ladybug, but... you'd be surprised how often I have to pause and collect myself.
You're too kind, Ladybug. Perhaps I'd be a sputtering mess, too, were I not an oracle.
Thank you, Marinette, but... you'd be surprised how often I have to pause and collect myself.
You're too kind, Marinette. Perhaps I'd be a sputtering mess, too, were I not an oracle.
No, no; you're more composed than you think, Marinette! You seem to be enjoying yourself, even.
Sometimes you must simply accept the past, no matter how painful. Besides, you seem like you've actually been enjoying yourself.
Is it my turn now? Don't be upset at my choice; you all had a first loss, too.
I've had an excellent start; I'm not afraid to continue.
Well, Tikki is right! It means the Goddess of Time is with me; I can glimpse the future, and change how time flows around me...
Being an oracle means I've been tasked with maintaining the flow of time. But… it's not as though I can run out of time to do that!
That's right, Mia. Would you care to hear a song?
I'm more than a songstress, Mia. Care for a song?
Oh, dear. E-erm... Navi, was it? Little fairy? I... I think you're mistaken...
Very well. Hmm? Navi, what...? That's... Well, you aren't completely wrong...
You really must have me mistaken, Navi. But that's okay.
I never knew what went through the minds of fairies. Do you suppose they're all like her, ~player~?
The goddess...? Oh, no! No, I'm but an oracle in her service.
Zelda's... move? I... I'm sorry, I'm not aware... I know of magic which bears the goddess's name, if that's what you mean.
I'm glad you like it, Uravity! And... n-no, I don't think my hearing's very remarkable at all. Why do you ask?
Thank you, Uravity! But... if you're talking about my ears, I'm just Hylian. I'm not sure if we have better hearing than humans...
Do you really like it? I'd say it took ages to grow out, but... I suppose that's not a problem for me.
My harp? Of course! I used to play a wonderful lullabye for my friends in the forest. It's never failed to shut every eye.
My harp? W-well... Din always asks me to play a romantic song after each Winter. But... that might be a bad idea here...
W-what I see in your future, Meia? Erm... okay, then...
Are you... certain, Meia? Foresight is not something to be trifled with...
Of course, Meia; I'd be more worried if you didn't doubt me, if I'm honest.
Really? I've never met anyone else with control over time! I erm... I hope nobody tries to use your power for ill gain...
You can rewind time too? E-erm... H-how far back can you go?
You can rewind time too? Well... at least we know you haven't been using that ability thus far…
Really? I've never met anyone else with control over time! I... suppose you decided against using it today, haven't you?
I'd be delighted to play you a song, Meia. All of you, in fact. Just know that my music is quite... potent.
I would, really, Meia, but... you see, my music commands much more than hearts.
Haha! It's okay, Ladybug; I appreciate the compliment.
Haha! Deep breath, Ladybug. Do you need a moment? I... might have a few to spare.
Haha! It's okay, Marinette; I appreciate the compliment.
Haha! Deep breath, Marinette. Do you need a moment? I... might have a few to spare.
I haven't the foggiest what you're blathering on about, hero.
Akuma? Kwami? Ugh, never mind. I've little concern for whatever you're going on about.
Hmhm... you don't know her very well, do you? Nayru's walking out of here just as clothed as when she arrived.
You must not know our Nayru; she's more than capable of retrieving her own clothing from the past.
So says the girl who can also rewind time. But very well, have it your way.
Oh? And here I thought you were already defeated. I won't make that mistake again.
Don't think you can still defeat me. This is only a minor setback.
Yes, Ochako. A blessing of the Goddess; with some focus, I can even step through time.
That's right, Ochako! But seeing the future is not the extent of my power.
A-Akumatized? I'm sorry... I'm not sure what you mean.
I know it could be worse; I'm the Oracle of Ages, remember? I've seen worse today. Erm... other todays...
Oh... oh, my. This is... quite the display, isn't it?
Goddess help me; what a shameful showing...
I've felt this... no! I-I can...!
Ngh! B-be gentle!
Wh-what? V-Veran?! No!
And all the safety those three brought me... for naught.
I... I hardly know whether I got lucky or unlucky...
I suppose it's only fair, if I'm wearing more than anyone else.
Very well. I'll shed some of my advantage.
I must follow all of you? I suppose that's reasonable.
And I was doing so well. As Din says, everything has its season.
All that's shrouded in darkness will be brought to the light. Just a moment...
My modesty was too much to hope for. Oh, well.
I suppose... there's not too much you all haven't seen yet.
Is it my turn now? Don't be upset at my choice; you all had a first loss, too.
I've had an excellent start; I'm not afraid to continue.
I've had the strangest song echoing in my mind... "Oh, hero, guided by the winds..."
You may have beaten me this time, but I'm just getting started.
I've lost again? I suppose it can't be helped.
You've all been spared a loss.
I've heard a new song of late. "Weary youth, changed by the Twilight..."
One step closer to the rest of you, right?
I'm not very fond of games of chance.
I do wish I could've done more.
There’s a song I can’t forget... it’s a part of me, I think. "Child of legend, cast through time..."
Oh, is it finally time for my tunic?
Has my time finally come?
I don’t know why this song... feels almost ageless. "Lost to the wilds, fallen champion..."
Oh, haha! Well, I suppose if I'm still winning...
I... I guess I can't complain.
You've won my dress, fair and square.
Oh? And here I thought you were already defeated. I won't make that mistake again.
Don't think you can still defeat me. This is only a minor setback.
Your future? W-well... I suppose I can try. Please, give me just a moment...
Would you truly like to know? Sometimes the future can be... daunting.

Gracious even in victory. I'm glad we've gotten the chance to play together, Ladybug.
Thank you, Marinette. You always know what to say.
Gracious even in victory. I'm glad we've gotten the chance to play together, Marinette.

Very well. I'll live.

I knew I'd lose this round. It still stings, though.

I suppose you've both won.
